# Pixel Font for FPGA

This project allows you to display bitmap text over VGA. Two python scripts
take pngs and convert them into a verilog LUT file.

A few sample font images have been included. The 8x16.png comes from here:
[IBM Character fonts](https://nerdlypleasures.blogspot.com/2015/04/ibm-character-fonts.html)

Here is how you use the python scripts:
```
# the w and h arguments specify the width and height in pixels of each character
./extract_font.py -w 8 -h 16 font_pngs/8x16.png > font.txt
./gen_font_lut.py font.txt > font_lut.v
```

For reference, this is what should be generated by the `extract_font.py` script
for the 8x16.png font:
